snippet: Senate Republicans blocked a bill on Wednesday aimed at restoring free contraception for women who get their health insurance from companies that object on religious grounds.
abstract: Senate Republicans block Democrat-sponsored bill intended to reverse Supreme Court ruling that closely held businesses with religious objections could deny coverage for contraception for women under Affordable Care Act.
lead_paragraph: Senate Republicans blocked a bill on Wednesday aimed at restoring free contraception for women who get their health insurance from companies that object on religious grounds.

headline.main: Republicans Block Bill to Restore Contraception
headline.print_headline: Republicans Block Bill to Restore Contraception

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
